author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Third Point Reports Stake In United Technologies, Takes Stake in EA, Pinnacle Foods
text:
May 15 (Reuters) - THIRD POINT LLC :
* THIRD POINT LLC REPORTS 7.1 MILLION SHARE STAKE IN UNITED TECHNOLOGIES CORP - SEC FILING
* THIRD POINT LLC TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 1.3 MILLION SHARES IN ELECTRONIC ARTS INC - SEC FILING
* THIRD POINT LLC DISSOLVES SHARE STAKE IN PINNACLE FOODS INC - SEC FILING
* THIRD POINT LLC TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 2.0 MILLION SHARES IN MARATHON PETROLEUM CORP - SEC FILING
* THIRD POINT LLC- CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF DEC 31, 2017 Source For the quarter ended Mar 31, 2018: bit.ly/2IjmYBd Source text for quarter ended Dec 31, 2017: bit.ly/2BtZhBz Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
